questions.question: 1.Which of the following are properties of a good use case? (Identify all that apply.)

answers.a: a.Starts with a request from the system to an actor.
answers.b: b.Ends with the system producing all answers the actor asked for.
answers.c: c.Ends with the system producing all answers the actor asked for.
answers.d: d.Describes the internal activities the system must take to produce all the answers the actor asked for.

questions.question: 2.Which of the following is not a step while creating a domain model?

answers.d: d.Identifying the condition and the determining the flow

questions.question: 3.A faculty is responsible for setting the question paper for an exam. Students attend the exam and the teaching assistant corrects their paper. There are also a few reviewers who attend the exam along with the students to judge the quality of the test. Identify the primary actor(s) in this process.
